awe6.interfaces.IUpdateable

type
interface
The IUpdatable interface should be implemented by any object wishing to enter the broad phase update traversal stack.

Instance Methods

getAge( ?asTime : Bool ) : Int

parameters
?asTime If true treats the time as milliseconds, otherwise as frame updates.
returns
The age of the object (as elapsed time, not time since birth).
The age of the object.

update( ?deltaTime : Int ) : Void

parameters
?deltaTime The time elapsed between this update and the previous update. Can be used to accurately influence rate of change - e.g. speed.
Used to modify the internal state according to object specific logic and the elapsed time.

This method is called internally by the framework, it will rarely need to be called directly.
